name: NASA Space Apps Cairo 2023
description:
• Received the `Most Innovative Solution` award (Top 1% – 150 teams, 25,000 EGP prize).
• Developed a web app for data sonification, converting images & videos into audible sounds.
• Implemented image processing & melody-fitting algorithms to enhance space imagery perception by aligning classical music pieces with the input frame RGB intensities.

name: IEEE Extreme 2023
description: • Ranked 32nd in Egypt before withdrawing at 18 hours; finished in Top 500 globally and 48th in Egypt.
